welcome.title: Welcome in the BrotherHoods Discord
welcome.description: Welcome to the server, {userID}! ðŸŽ‰ We are glad to have you join us in the BrotherHoods community. Please take a moment to read through our rules and guidelines, and don't hesitate to reach out to a member of the community or a moderator if you have any questions or need any help. We look forward to getting to know you better and having you be a part of our community.
